issue.title: d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net is blocked despite not showing up in blocklists
issue.body:
### Platform

Windows

### Protocol

Regular

### Do you use AdGuard app?

Yes I am

### Your configuration

As stated in the title d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net is blocked despite not showing up in blocklists. We were having issues in one of our websites which were only resolved after we added the address as an unblock rule.

Upon searching it on the blocklists, the address in quesiton does not show up.

### Traceroute to AdGuard DNS

_No response_

### Issue Details

https://d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net/assets/common/img/logos/payment/new_logos_payment/ar/link@2x.png cannot we accessed without adding an exclusion when using the default block list.



### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

Website is blocked https://d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net/

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

_No response_

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/REDACTED_ID/analytics](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fconsole.firebase.google.com%2Fu%2F0%2Fproject%2FREDACTED_ID%2Fanalytics) ### Comment > Default AdGuard DNS filtering rules breaks Firebase console screen for browsing analytics. Based on my observations it blocks `analytics.google.com` and other related hosts which ends up with broken firebase page. > > I would like to be able to use Firebase console fully without deactivating filter for google analytics globally. ``` Username: @TomaszLizer ``` ### Screenshots

AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
We blocked analytics.google.com because is it used not only in the dashboard, but for tracking
`https://analytics.google.com/g/collect?v=`

Please try our private DNS https://adguard-dns.io/
There you may unblock/block any domain.

issue.title: d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net is blocked despite not showing up in blocklists

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Platform

Windows

### Protocol

Regular

### Do you use AdGuard app?

Yes I am

### Your configuration

As stated in the title d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net is blocked despite not showing up in blocklists. We were having issues in one of our websites which were only resolved after we added the address as an unblock rule.

Upon searching it on the blocklists, the address in quesiton does not show up.

### Traceroute to AdGuard DNS

_No response_

### Issue Details

https://d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net/assets/common/img/logos/payment/new_logos_payment/ar/link@2x.png cannot we accessed without adding an exclusion when using the default block list.



### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

Website is blocked https://d26lpennugtm8s.cloudfront.net/

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
<!-- paste screenshot here -->
</details>


### Additional Information

_No response_
